best_gem_comment: This expos is an highly underrated gem! Take it, I loved all the material that we had to read/watch for this class (Icelandic Saga, Minari, etc). Its very low–key and extremely interesting as the topic of "family trees" applies to each and every one of us.
best_gem_comment_short: This expos is an highly underrated gem!

best_gem_comment: This class is an absolute GEM! Animal rights are such an overlooked yet pressing issue, and Sparsha clearly cares deeply about the topic and each and every student in the class! She gives amazing feedback on every single assignment and the outside events, while numerous, are all incredibly engaging (especially the trip to the Arboretum). WOULD HIGHLY RECOMMEND IT!!!!!!!
best_gem_comment_short: This class is an absolute GEM!

best_gem_comment: Please take this course with Kate if you can. It is a must–take before you graduate, definitely a "transformative experience". You will learn a lot and Kate is simply the best, a gem!!!
best_gem_comment_short: You will learn a lot and Kate is simply the best, a gem!!

best_gem_comment: This class is a gem! Keating is the best professor and is very understanding. The topic of sports and politics is really interesting, especially if you have experience in it. Definitely take this class. The work load is not bad at all and Keating is very perceptive to students.

Everyone speaks about how it's great and a gem so I'll spare you those details. If you actually want to use this course to become better at public speaking (as you should), then know that this is just like any other skill. If you work hard and go beyond the demands of the assignments, you will improve a lot and gain a lot as a speaker. If you do what you need to do to get by you will not gain much from the course. I think that if you just want to take a gem, don't waste spots for other people who might take real advantage of this amazing opportunity and go for the Greek Hero or something :)Also, Lee Nishri–Howitt is an amazing instructor. He has fine–tuned senses to see where different issues are coming from and has some unique and helpful fixes to them. He also creates a welcoming class environment and is very non–judgmental. IDK about other instructors, but Lee is the bees knees. :)
best_gem_comment_short: Everyone speaks about how it's great and a gem so I'll spare you those details.
